wikipedia_page.main: Bethan Ellis Owen (born Bangor, Gwynedd) is a Welsh television actress best known for playing the character of Ffion Llewelyn in the Welsh soap Pobol y Cwm.She was a pupil at Ysgol Gyfun Llanhari after moving to South Wales as a child.

response: * Bethan Ellis Owen as Bronwen Rees

link_mentions.page: List of Pobol y Cwm characters
response: |Ffion Llywelyn (née Roberts) || Bethan Ellis Owen || 2004– || Deputy headteacher of Ysgol y Mynach; widow of Owen, ex-wife of Hywel Llywelyn. Mother of Macs White's daughter, Arwen Hedd. Recovering alcoholic. Was previously in an on-off relationship with former step-son, Rhys.

Parry Jones has four children with her husband, musician Myfyr Isaac: Elan, Miriam, Moc and Greta, all of whom also work in the arts. Myfyr also has an older son, Gideon (who was the partner of actress Bethan Ellis Owen). Her father was musician Rhys Jones.
